pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Large Herbivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Neutral $(br)$(l)Type:$() Herd Animal $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Wetlands

Journal Page by $(l)Unknown Survivor$() $(br2)The Gryposaurus is a herd herbivore. They're mostly-peaceful unless attacked, and their babies can be tamed with veggies. They can be ridden with a saddle, chested, and can wear carpets.
